snippet: The All-Russian People’s Front, a political group, chose President Vladimir V. Putin as its leader on Thursday at its founding convention.
abstract: Political group All-Russian People’s Front chooses Pres Vladimir V Putin as its leader at its founding convention.
lead_paragraph: The All-Russian People’s Front, a political group, chose President Vladimir V. Putin as its leader on Thursday at its founding convention.

headline.main: New Party Picks Putin as Leader
headline.print_headline: Russia: New Party Picks Putin as Leader
